sermons.title: Broken In Pieces by Scott Hynds (nepalese / english)
Freedom From Sin by Scott Hynds (nepalese / english)
Godâ€™s Mercies In Nepal
sermons.description: A little-known but much used Nepali church planter who spent much of his early ministry in prison for his faith. Despite that the Lord was pleased to save many in the prisons and surrounding areas through his preaching and start churches in most cities he was imprisoned, to the point the Nepali government sent him out of the prison system and essentially said they didnâ€™t want the government to keep funding his church planting activities by housing him in prison and he should just go do it at his own expense!

sermons.title: Introduction to Kathmandu
sermons.preacher_description:
George Verwer (1938 - Present)
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker George Verwer in mp3 format. Founder of Operation Mobilization an missions organization that sends out full-time and part-time missionaries to many countries in the world. One of the burdens of brother George has been to distribute powerful literature to Christians such as: "The Calvary Road by Roy Hession," and many others. 

George Verwer has written many books including the powerful book: "Come, Live, Die!" He has mobilized and encouraged thousands of Christian workers to fulfill their calling in the Lord to reach the lost world with the Gospel of Jesus Christ.
